channel.title: How To Make It You Can Chuck Tomatoes At People -get mod on mgscape if help me!
channel.description:
Hello i am MG from mgscape.no-ip.org my sever source is :pimpscape
I Need some hopefuly simple help and in reward i will give you mod in my game...
Just tell me how to make it you can throw rotten tomatoes at people..... and have the thing... like
You: You have thrown a rotten tomatoe at (playername) playername: You have had a Rotten Tomatoe Thrown At You By (playername)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2007, 12:18:23 AM[/size][hr]cant any one help me?!
